TableField.name: PartnershipID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|An automatically assigned number used to track unique partnerships

TableField.name: OrganizationID
TableField.phrase: Implementing Organization|The organization with primary responsibility for implementing this partnership and maintaining currency with existing laws and internal requirements

ForeignField.name: Organization
ForeignField.phrase: Implementing Organization|The organization with primary responsibility for implementing this partnership and maintaining currency with existing laws and internal requirements

TableField.name: PartnershipTitle
TableField.phrase: Partnership Title|A unique title assigned to the partnership by the implementing organization

TableField.name: PartnershipNumber
TableField.phrase: Partnership Number|A unique number assigned to the partnership by the implementing organization

TableField.name: PartnershipPolicyID
TableField.phrase: Policy|A combined field used to describe this partnership policy when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: PolicyOrganizationID
ForeignField.phrase: Policy Organization|The organization with primary responsibility for initiating this partnership requirement and communicating new laws and internal requirements affecting the partnership

ForeignField.name: PolicyOrganization
ForeignField.phrase: Policy Organization|The organization with primary responsibility for initiating this partnership requirement and communicating new laws and internal requirements affecting the partnership

ForeignField.name: PolicyTitleID
ForeignField.phrase: Partnership Title|The name of the partnership to be implemented at the local organization

CodeField.name: PolicyTitle
CodeField.phrase: Policy Title|The name of the partnership to be implemented at the local organization

ForeignField.name: PolicyNumber
ForeignField.phrase: Policy Number|A number assigned to a partnership for purposes of standardizing the format and structure of partnership manuals

ForeignField.name: PolicyPurpose
ForeignField.phrase: Policy Purpose|A detailed description of the purpose for the partnership; such as, regulatory reguirement, best practices, corporate requirement, etc.
ForeignField.sample: Regulatory compliance (OSHA, EPA, USDA), corporate mandate and best practices

TableField.name: PartnershipPurpose
TableField.phrase: Partnership Purpose|A detailed description of the local purpose for the partnership; such as, local regulatory reguirements, best local practices, regional requirements, etc.
TableField.sample: The Family and Medical Leave partnership is designed to address family and medical leave across functional boundries. The Family and Medical Leave partnership is similar to most company's Leave of Absence program but this partnership addresses Family and Medical Leave of all types (i.e. care for family, disability, etc.) and applies to all business functions and risk imperatives

ForeignField.name: PolicyScope
ForeignField.phrase: Policy Scope|A detailed description of the scope of the partnership. The scope reflects the authority and organizational reach of the partnership
ForeignField.sample: All departments and employees of the local organization

TableField.name: PartnershipScope
TableField.phrase: Partnership Scope|A detailed description of the local scope of the partnership. The scope reflects the local authority and organizational reach of the partnership
TableField.sample: The Family and Medical Leave partnership is designed to address family and medical leave across functional boundries. The Family and Medical Leave partnership is similar to most company's Leave of Absence program but this partnership addresses Family and Medical Leave of all types (i.e. care for family, disability, etc.) and applies to all business functions and risk imperatives

ForeignField.name: PartnershipPolicy
ForeignField.phrase: Policy|A combined field used to describe this partnership policy when associating it with other records
ForeignField.sample: Incentives | Policy Number: 10.0 | Active Agenda, HQ

TableField.name: CommitmentStatement
TableField.phrase: Commitment Statement|A statement made on behalf of the organization and displayed to pledge support for programs and/or policies implemented by the organization
TableField.sample: Management and leadership will support the program with financial and human resources as required for success

RemoteField.name: CommittedLeaderID
RemoteField.phrase: Committed Leader|The highest ranking leadership person pledging to support the implementation of the partnership with human and financial resources

ForeignField.name: CommittedLeader
ForeignField.phrase: Committed Leader|The highest ranking leadership person pledging to support the implementation of the partnership with human and financial resources

RemoteField.name: PersonAccountableID
RemoteField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for implementing this partnership and maintaining currency with existing laws and internal requirements

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountable
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for implementing this partnership and maintaining currency with existing laws and internal requirements

TableField.name: PartnershipStatusID
TableField.phrase: Partnership Status|Development status of the partnership

CodeField.name: PartnershipStatus
CodeField.phrase: Partnership Status|Development status of the partnership

RemoteField.name: LastReviewDate
RemoteField.phrase: Last Review|The date of the last formal review of the partnership

SummaryField.name: RiskImperatives
SummaryField.phrase: Risk Imperatives|A list of associated Risk Imperatives

SummaryField.name: TotalEstExp
SummaryField.phrase: Estimated Exposure|The total estimated cost exposure associated with the partnership

SummaryField.name: TotalEstOpp
SummaryField.phrase: Estimated Opportunity|The total estimated financial opportunity associated with the partnership

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: Partnership
CombinedField.phrase: Partnership|A combined field used to describe this partnership when associating it with other records
CombinedField.sample: Incentives | Active Agenda, HQ | Under Development

CodeCheckSearchField.name: RiskImperativeID
CodeCheckSearchField.phrase: Risk Imperatives|Filter search results by one or more related risk imperatives

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Implementation
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: People Elements
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific information regarding the way this module impacts people should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about how this module impacts, or is impacted by, people in general. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Barriers to success
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific barriers to success in implemeting this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about barriers to success associated with the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Data Collection
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific data collection methods, locations, and resources should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about collecting the types of data associated with the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Data Input
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific data input methods, permissions, and requirements should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about inputting the types of data associated with the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Organizational Information
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific knowledge and information that impacts the subject matter of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about organizational considerations associated with the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Common Practices and Alternatives
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific knowledge of common or past practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about common practices associated with the subject matter of this module and opportunities for change enabled by the Active Agenda project. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Organizational Learning
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific learning goals, purposes, and opportunities should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about organizational learning associated with the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Training
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific training considerations and requirements should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about training associated with the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Applying Knowledge
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific knowledge application methods should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about applying the knowledge collected in association with the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific questions that are frequently asked of administrators or implementers should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see the types of questions collected, and answers provided, by the Active Agenda community relating to the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
